experience: You and Stephanie both know Josh Stomel, Chris Cox, and 7 others

We all know that today’s workplace is increasingly challenging.  Companies are faced with global competitive demands, socio-economic fluctuations, mergers, acquisitions, lay-offs, and so much more.  On top of that, today’s workers on are “on” 24/7, infusing work demands with life. These new challenges provide a number of new distractions and stressors impacting the quality of work and the ability for employees, managers and leaders to be fully present with each moment and meet company goals.Conscious Workplaces offers programs that give your employees the tools to meet the changing demands through the wisdom and power of mindfulness.   As a result, your workforce will cultivate it’s own natural emotional intelligence, be more productive, and less stressed.    Average participants report better relationships with coworkers, increased sense of well-being and personal sense of control as well as a decrease in stress-related symptoms of 42% on average.To find out more about how Conscious Workplaces can help your company achieve its goals, contact: stephanie_tate7@yahoo.com

At Atlas we are fundamentally changing the idea of what it means to search and remember. For two decades, search engines have been finding what you don’t know, but they can’t find what you’ve forgotten. Regardless of device, where you saw it, or who shared it with you, Atlas will extend your memory, connecting the dots, making you smarter and more productive. You can help bring clarity to the chaos. We are looking for talented entrepreneurs to redefine the productivity and collaboration paradigm. Join our team: https://www.atlas.co/careers/

Founded by leading experts from Yahoo, Microsoft, Oracle, and University of Washington and venture-backed by successful entrepreneurs, LigaDATA is a big data startup with proven open source technology that allows our clients to achieve complex, data driven insights at high speed and leverage data science to solve real business challenges. Our open source data platform is highly scalable and we are growing rapidly. Through numerous patents, collaborations with leading data science and engineering academic institutions and vast contributions to the open source community, the LigaDATA team is bringing the power of [our platform] and distributed storage to companies of all sizes in the banking, healthcare, Internet and media sectors. Current clients include the financial second largest financial services company in the world, other Fortune 500 firms and a leading healthcare technology provider.Our dynamic work environment encourages and rewards innovators who bring outside-the-box thinking and leadership skills. Do you have the entrepreneurial vision and ambition to be a part of our journey?Currently hiring for Server-Side SW Engineers, SQE and Customer Engagement Managers.

VP HRBP at Facebook
May 10, 2013, Stephanie worked with Christine in the same group

Stephanie is fantastic at what she does. She knows how to help teams scope their roles appropriately, is creative and tenacious about finding really relevant candidates, never passes through a candidate that she does not feel very confident in, does a great job of assessing a candidate's fit for the role and the culture, manages the candidate experience flawlessly and works really well internally to get the support she needs. I can't say enough about her effectiveness and the many ways in which she adds value beyond filling roles. Her experience as an HR business partner allow her to help managers think creatively about how to structure their organizations to fill even very complex talent gaps. She's is truly delightful to work with, always calm and infinitely reasonable even in high pressure situations.

VP of People at Zoosk
May 5, 2009, Stephanie reported directly to Carol

I have worked with and for Carol Mahoney for nearly 10 years and two companies.  At Yahoo! Carol built a small and poorly organized staffing organization of 35 to nearly 250 at one point.  Carol has an amazing strategic ability coupled with operational rigor to develop a high performing and (multiple) award winning organization.  She brings humor, candor and an amazing ability to not only see the big picture but pull the right talent into the right jobs to achieve amazing results.  I say today, what I've said before, "I'd work for Carol anywhere."

summary: Stephanie brings 20 years of hi-tech experience to the table and has held a variety of HR Leadership roles from start-ups to mid-size organizations.  She knows intimately the challenges faced by hi-tech companies and it’s leaders, managers and employees. Stephanie is also a trained Mind Body Stress Reduction educator and has been teaching for several years in medical settings, workplaces, weekly meditation groups and retreat settings across the country.  “It occurred to me after teaching in medical settings that I was teaching the people that I often work with.  Many of them were complaining of stress-related illnesses due to work.  So why were we waiting until people were getting sick to help them?  Let’s bring this to work and see what happens.” The programs originally created by Jon Kabat-Zinn at the University of Massachusetts have been adapted to fit the  workplace and the results have been remarkable.All of the programs that are offered statistically verified so there is no question that what is offered works for your company.   And there is a ton of neuroscience research to show why it works.
